Title: Riverbrook
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan hunts an escaped prisoner who is determined to reunite with his ex-wife...and his stashed fortune.
